thread.title: Stormzy surprises shoppers with secret gig at Westfield
thread.title_full: Stormzy surprises shoppers with secret gig at Westfield

author: Saphora Smith
title: Stormzy surprises shoppers with secret gig at Westfield
text:
Wednesday 1 March 2017 17:33 GMT Click to followThe Evening Standard (@nationsixphilip) 
London grime artist Stormzy has surprised shoppers by playing an impromptu gig at Wesfield in west London. 
Pictures of the gig in Shepherd’s Bush showed scores of people crammed into a small space outside the shopping centre as Stormzy took to the stage. 
Video footage posted online by Stormzy fans captured the grime star rapping and interacting with the crowd as bemused shoppers descended the escalators behind him. 
Other footage captured by the gym Fitness First showed a sea of smart phones pointed in Stormzy’s direction and the crowd jumping in time to the music. Stormzy bout to bring the storm in westfield 
Shocked shoppers took to social media to express their delight to have caught the gig. HOW WAS I LEAVING WESTFIELD TO VERYONE SCREAMING STORMZY AND HES THERE 
Many said Stormzy was joined on stage by British singer MNEK as well as a choir for his performance. When stormzy performs in Westfield but you can't go 🙄🙄🙄🙄 — Sparkle Alex ♥ (@Sparkle__Alex) March 1, 2017 
One tweeting under the handle Butterflies wrote: “Stormzy done a surprise lil show at Westfield with a choir and menk; I was on my way home from work and just happened to catch it.” 
Mariam Darwish wrote: “How was I leaving Westfield to everyone screaming Stormzy and he’s there.” Stormzy announces two new secret London concerts 
Others expressed their frustration that they had missed it. Ristyle_X posted: “I work near Westfield everyday. The one day I decide to work from home Stormzy wants to be out there dishing out free performances lol” 
Another user called Nancy Ma said: “Whoever is at White City Westfield please record stormzy blinded by your grade II with MNEK and a choir. I need to see that s**t.” More about:
